description: Unappealable surface axiom - only bundle content can change outcomes
rule: Only bundle content can change outcomes. Not arguments.
what_cannot_change_outcomes: New evidence discovered later (unless added to bundle and bundle hash changes)
Policy changes (unless profile version changes, which is a bundle content change)
what_can_change_outcomes: Bundle content changes (adding/removing/modifying files changes bundle hash)
Profile version changes (using different profile version changes profile_id in bundle)
Schema version changes (using different schema versions changes schema_hashes)
Contract version changes (using different contract versions changes contract_hash)
Invalidation addition (adding valid invalidation targeting this bundle is structural change)
verifier_requirements: Compute bundle hash from bundle content only
Reject any attempt to influence verdict based on external state
Fail closed if bundle content is ambiguous or incomplete
Output verdict deterministically based solely on bundle content + profile + contracts + schemas
legal_implications: Verdicts are reproducible by any third party
No 'moving goalposts' after bundle is frozen
Cryptographic binding of truth to content
Dispute resolution based on evidence, not arguments
